lines: Unshaken as the sacred hills, And fixed as mountains stand;
Firm as the rock the soul shall rest, That trusts the Almighty hand.
Not walls nor hills could guard so well, Fair Salemâ€™s happy ground,
As those eternal arms of love, That every saint surround.
Do good, O Lord, do good to those, Who cleave to Thee in heart,
Who on thy truth alone repose, Nor from Thy law depart.
